# motionEndBorderMode

**Instance Property**

The motion border mode describing what happens if Metal samples the acceleration structure after the motion end time.

## Declaration

```swift
var motionEndBorderMode: MTLMotionBorderMode
```

## Specifying motion data

- **motionStartTime**: The start time of the motion instance.
- **motionStartBorderMode**: The motion border mode describing what happens if Metal samples the acceleration structure before the motion start time.
- **motionEndTime**: The end time of the motion instance.
- **motionTransformsCount**: The number of motion transforms belonging to the motion instance.
- **motionTransformsStartIndex**: The index of the first set of transforms describing one keyframe of the animation.
